verbose_text: As previous work has shown that genetic deletion of IPMK in mouse embryonic stem cells (ESCs) leads to a marked reduction in IP 6 levels without altering cell viability, we used CRISPR / Cas9 to remove IPMK from human 293T cells (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY A).
evidence: IPMK in mouse embryonic stem cells (ESCs) leads to a marked reduction in IP 6  levels without altering cell viability
